example: Asia has about 1/4 of the Earth's land area.
Asia has about 60% of the Earth's population.

kana: こくないそうせいさん
example: Asia has about 36% of the World's GDP.
There are high mountains in the middle of Asia.
People in Japan and Korea use Kanji.
People in Japan and Korea eat rice with chopsticks.
Many people worked on a rubber plantation or as a spice merchant.

kana: こうりょうのしょうにん
example: Many people worked on a rubber plantation or as a spice merchant.
More people have cars, so there is more traffic congestion.
